entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
